timeline.message: :construction: Updated to reflect change in select2 behaviour
:bug: Fixed issue where managers could not load Users listing page

timeline.bodyText: Another change to add in this file please.  The original issue was that it was throwing a 500 when access was denied.  Can you remove the handleAccessDenied method at the bottom of this file?  That's what was causing the 500 error as the template it's trying to load doesn't exist.  If a user tries to access this page it'll give the access denied page as it should.
timeline.author: tom114
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -91,7 +91,7 @@ public UsersController(UserService userService, ProjectService projectService,
 	 * @return The name of the page.
 	 */
 	@RequestMapping
-	@PreAuthorize("hasRole('ROLE_ADMIN')")
+	@PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('ROLE_ADMIN', 'ROLE_MANAGER')")

replies.bodyText: Thanks.  This looks good.  I'll merge and push the release.
replies.author: tom114
